page.title: 19CRICKET & FOOTBALL CLUBS
page.content:
{Tackley Cricket Club}reformed in 1984 after a 20 year break. A square is being made on the playing field. There are 40 members, aged 13 to 60. We play 20 games a season against other villages. The club hopes to enter the local league in 1987.
{Tackley Football Club}saw its best ever season in 1984/5. The first team won promotion to {Division One} of the Witney and District League. The Reserves missed promotion from Division 4 by one point. Trevor Mason scored 25 goals for the first team,a club record. The club held an end of season dinner dance at The King's Arms Hotel in Bicester.
